mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ORDER_BUNDLE(ORDER_BUNDLE_ID, MEMBER_ID, REG_DATE, RECEIVE_NAME, TEL, POST_NUM, ADDRESS2, ADDRESS1, USED_POINT, PAY_METHOD,FINAL_TOT_PRICE,FINAL_DISCOUNT_PRICE,FINAL_DELIVERY_COST) VALUES (#{orderBundleId},#{memberId},SYSDATE, #{receiveName},#{tel},#{postNum},#{address2}, #{address1},#{usedPoint},#{payMethod},#{finalTotPrice}, #{finalDiscountPrice},#{finalDeliveryCost})

SELECT SEQ_ORDER_ITEM.NEXTVAL as orderItemId FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO ORDER_ITEM(ORDER_ITEM_ID, ORDER_ID, PRODUCT_ID, COUPON_ID,PRICE, FINAL_PRICE, DISCOUNT_PERCENT) VALUES (#{orderItemId},#{orderBundleId},#{productId},#{couponId, jdbcType=INTEGER},#{originalPrice},#{finalPrice},#{disCountPercent})
INSERT INTO ORDER_STATUS(ORDER_STATUS_ID, ORDER_ITEM_ID, STATUS, REG_DATE) VALUES (SEQ_ORDER_STATUS.nextval,#{orderItemId},#{status},SYSDATE)
